name: test_CMS_11_7_0_Mark_Single_Notification_As_Read_Unread
description:
Test Case 207: Verify marking a single notification as read and unread.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Mark a single notification as read
5. Mark the same notification as unread
6. Verify status changes correctly
descriptionHtml:
Test Case 207: Verify marking a single notification as read and unread.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Notifications page
  4. Mark a single notification as read
  5. Mark the same notification as unread
  6. Verify status changes correctly
